file_content.text: A new thread weaves through fate's tapestry. As I foresaw.
Then Arcann told the truth. You did bring him here.
It was necessary. You will see. The Scions remain your allies. Each of them will return to you when it is their time to die.
None of this was necessary. Asylum's people are dying because of you.
Your betrayal is taking lives.
Thousands weighed against trillions... they perish so the galaxy survives.
No more Scions need to die. Tell me where they've gone and I'll protect them.
Tell me how to save them.
Their fates are sealed. Like yours.
I'll never trust a Scion again. If your people come near me, they're dead.
I plan to kill them.
They have a destiny. Not even you can change it.
I have no regrets. I have seen the future. It is glorious.
If you know how this ends, tell me while you still can.
Reveal what you saw.
You doomed Asylum for a fantasy. Your visions were the hallucinations of a madman.
You've lost your mind.
Arcann and I agree on one thing. You are a fool.
[Kill Heskal]
Spare no one.
You always know just how to brighten my day.
Jedi = changed // Execution = unnecessary
Jedi = cruel // Execution = unnecessary
Barsen'thor = ruthless // Execution = unnecessary
Major = ruthless // Execution = unnecessary
Captain = ruthless // Execution = unnecessary
Sith Lord = ruthless // Execution = unnecessary
Bounty hunter = ruthless // Execution = unnecessary
Agent = ruthless // Execution = unnecessary
